author: sky.cactus
content: That is a very long document, discussing it entirely would take a couple ACD calls just by itself.  What did you have in mind?

author: sky.cactus
content: I would especially like to avoid just spending the call reading the document, I don't think that is a good use of call time when people can read it on their own.

author: timbeiko
content: Oh, yeah, agreed! I think it'd be good to just stick to the suggestions, and perhaps even a subset of them. This just requires people have skimmed it in advance. I can also try and polish the suggestion section to what I think are the highest impact ones üëç

author: sky.cactus
content: Maybe start with the highest impact single suggestion?

author: sky.cactus
content: So as to not overwhelm discussion with too many proposed changes to process at once.
